3 days free trial!

Features:
- Instant answers for your Canvas quiz questions
- Seamlessly integrates with Canvas quiz interface
- Adds a convenient "Get Answer" button to each question

Note: Only works for quiz in Canvas, no support for external or third party quiz tools.

How It Works:
- Install the extension
- Open your Canvas quiz
- Click "Get Answer" next to any question for the answer.


Canvas Quiz Solver has been developed to help you get right answers for every quiz questions on your exams and quiz. By just clicking a get answer button, you can get the correct answers to your quiz questions of any course hosted on canvas.

Shows you right answers 
Subscription:
$4.99/month for unlimited access

This tool is powered by AI and is designed to supplement your learning, not replace active studying.
Answers may not always be 100% accurate, especially for course-specific content

- Not intended for cheating or academic dishonesty
